import { Container, ButtonGroup, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../styles/css/Home.css"; import { useTypewriter, Cursor } from "react-simple-typewriter"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faLinkedin, faGithub, faInstagram, faLetterboxd, } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import { useSpring, animated } from "react-spring"; const Home = () => { const [text] = useTypewriter({ words: ["Full Stack Developer üë®üèº‚Äçüíª", "Designer üî®", "Photographer üì∏"], loop: {}, typeSpeed: 120, deleteSpeed: 80, }); return ( <>

Hi, I'm a {text}

Akhilesh Kumbar
 ); }; export default Home;
